amendatorysection.chaptername: Cities and Villages; Laws Applicable to All
amendatorysection.para: (1) This section applies until the implementation date designated by the Director of Motor Vehicles under section 60-3,113.01.
(2) The Department of Motor Vehicles shall adopt and promulgate rules and regulations necessary to fulfill any duties and obligations as provided in sections 18-1736 to 18-1741.07.
